levelupdocs-hunter-text:
Hunter
Hunter: The art of hunting

As a hunter you can get experience by killing any type of entity.

Upgrades
Hunter levels will grant you more damage from all sources of damage you deal to any entities.
levelupdocs-axe-text:
Axe
Axe: Cunning lumberjacks

Using your axe to chop down trees and break wood will grant you experience with axes.

Upgrades
Axe levels will grant you more damage to your axe, and will increase your breaking speed when using axes.
levelupdocs-bow-text:
Bow
Bow: Arrow Man

Killing entities with your bow will grant experience with bows.

Upgrades
Bow levels will grant you more damage when using bows, reduce the chance of losing the arrow after hitting, and ensure greater accuracy.
levelupdocs-pickaxe-text:
Pickaxe
Pickaxe: Stone Lovers

Mining with your pickaxe will grant you experience, mining ores will give you even more experience, using it as a weapon will also grant you a bit of experience.

Upgrades
Pickaxe levels will increase the speed at which blocks break, increase the chance of dropping more ores, and ultimately increase damage when using pickaxes.
levelupdocs-shovel-text:
Shovel
Shovel: Soil Lovers

Digging with your shovel will grant you experience, using it as a weapon will also grant you a bit of experience.

Upgrades
Shovel levels will increase the breaking speed of blocks and an increase in damage when using shovels.
levelupdocs-knife-text:
Knife
Knife: Professional skinners

Skinning an animal or using it as a weapon will grant you experience with knives, you can also receive experience cutting grasses and leaves with knives.

Upgrades
Knife levels will increase the speed at which leaves and grasses break and an increase in damage when using knives, when skinning any animal the loot will also be increased.
levelupdocs-spear-text:
Spear
Spear: Sharp

Throwing or hitting creatures with spears will grant experience.

Upgrades
Spear levels will increase all damage dealt by spears, it will also ensure greater accuracy when throwing a spear.
levelupdocs-hammer-text:
Hammer
Hammer: Blacksmiths

Using your hammer as a weapon will grant you experience, but also using it to forge equipment will grant you experience.

Upgrades
Hammer levels will grant higher return when crafting items, and will also grant more damage to hammers.
levelupdocs-sword-text:
Sword
Sword: Warriors

Using swords in combat will grant you experience.

Upgrades
Sword levels will grant you more damage to your swords.
levelupdocs-shield-text:
Shield
Shield: Guards

Using your shield will grant experience with shields.

Upgrades
Shield levels will grant greater defense when using shield.
levelupdocs-hand-text:
Hand
Hand: Monks

Using your bare hands to eliminate creatures will grant you experience.

Upgrades
Hand levels will increase the damage dealt with your fists.
levelupdocs-farming-text:
Farming
Farming: Patients

Harvesting crops in their later stages will give you experience, as will plowing the soil

Upgrades
Farmer levels will provide you with more crops.
levelupdocs-cooking-text:
Cooking
Cooking: Chef

Cooking over a campfire will guarantee you experience.

Upgrades
Cook levels will increase the amount of servings and increase how fresh the food will get.
levelupdocs-panning-text:
Panning
Panning: Rattle

Panning will grant experience.

Upgrades
Panning levels will guarantee you more loot when panning and a greater chance of an item appearing.
levelupdocs-vitality-text:
Vitality
Vitality: Punching Bag

Taking damage will grant you experience.

Upgrades
Vitality levels will grant you more life and regeneration.
levelupdocs-leatherarmor-text:
Leather Armor
Leather Armor: Leatherworker

When you receive damage using leather armor you will gain experience with leather armor, the more leather armor you have, the more experience you will obtain.

Upgrades
Leather armor levels will grant you more resistance to damage.
levelupdocs-chainarmor-text:
Chain Armor
Chain Armor: Leatherworker

When you receive damage using chain armor you will gain experience with chain armor, the more chain armor you have, the more experience you will obtain.

Upgrades
Chain armor levels will grant you more resistance to damage.
